Package de.chojo.sadu.wrapper.stage

Interface QueryStage<T>

Type Parameters:
T - return type
All Known Implementing Classes:
QueryBuilder
public interface QueryStage<T>
Represents a QueryStage of a QueryBuilder. Allows to set the sql query.

Can either redirect to a StatementStage or directly to a ResultStage

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    StatementStage<T> query​(String sql)
    Set the query to execute.
    default StatementStage<T> query​(String sql, Object... objects)
    Set the query to execute.
    ResultStage<T> queryWithoutParams​(String sql)
    Set the query to execute.
    default ResultStage<T> queryWithoutParams​(String sql, Object... objects)
    Set the query to execute.

  • Method Details

    • query

      @CheckReturnValue StatementStage<T> query​(String sql)
      Set the query to execute.
      Parameters:
      sql - query to set.
      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in a StatementStage with the query defined.

    • query

      @CheckReturnValue default StatementStage<T> query​(String sql, Object... objects)
      Set the query to execute.
      Parameters:
      sql - query to set.
      objects - objects to replace in a String.format(String, Object...) Do not use this with user input! This should be only used to insert column or table names at runtime
      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in a StatementStage with the query defined.

    • queryWithoutParams

      @CheckReturnValue ResultStage<T> queryWithoutParams​(String sql)
      Set the query to execute.

      This will also skip the statement stage.

      Parameters:
      sql - query to set.
      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in a ResultStage with the query defined and no parameter set.

    • queryWithoutParams

      @CheckReturnValue default ResultStage<T> queryWithoutParams​(String sql, Object... objects)
      Set the query to execute.

      This will also skip the statement stage.

      Parameters:
      sql - query to set.
      objects - objects to replace in a String.format(String, Object...) Do not use this with user input! This should be only used to insert column or table names at runtime
      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in a ResultStage with the query defined and no parameter set.
